reviewsJson.markdown:
**Rda**/ Velocity 

**% Used**/ 10 

**coil**/ Clapton **w**/ 45

**Steep time**/1 week **wicking**/ Full   
            
**Mouth Feel** - Sharp and fizzy with a slight throat hit. Not very dense would give it a 4 out of 10.      
  
**Flavor Properties**- Soda with the nice Ginger Snap, and lemon lime flavor.
                 
**Relatable Flavors** -  Without using the words ginger ale or soda. Like drinking sparkling cider or champagne after chewing on fresh ginger.

**Position in the recipe** - Pretty good stand alone flavoring should make a nice top note or base, and at lower % will give you a nice fizzy accent.

**Pairings** -  All citrus flavors especially Orange should work nicely. Add a little cream to make a cream soda, and for an adventure in odd flavors I'm going to try it with a little chocolate.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Ginger Ale VG Version
